mapper.insert: INSERT INTO USERS ( u_id, u_pw, u_name, u_birth, u_gender, u_phone, u_nick, u_addr, u_addrDetail, u_signup ) VALUES ( #{userId}, #{userPw}, #{userName}, #{userBirth}, #{userGender}, #{userPhone}, #{userNick}, #{userAddr}, #{userAddrDetail}, #{userSignUp} )
mapper.select: SELECT u_id FROM users WHERE u_id = #{userId}
SELECT u_id, u_nick, u_phone FROM users WHERE u_id=#{userId}, u_nick=#{userNick}, u_phone=#{userPhone}
mapper.update: UPDATE users SET u_pw = #{userPw}, u_name = #{userName}, u_birth = #{userBirth}, u_gender = #{userGender}, u_phone = #{userPhone}, u_nick = #{userNick}, u_addr = #{userAddr}, u_addrDetail = #{userAddrDetail} WHERE u_id = #{userId}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM users WHERE u_id = #{userId} AND u_pw = #{userPw}
